estuary.model

Class ModelMazeGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • estuary.model.Game
      • estuary.model.ModelMazeGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tickable, GameFunctionality, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MazeTutorial

    public class ModelMazeGame
extends Game
    The player completes the game by moving the mazeCrab to the estuary point. The player must navigate past predators and barriers to find their way to the end
    Author:
    Sean Rajkowski
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ModelMazeGame

        public ModelMazeGame()
        Constructor that initializes the Maze Game's elements. A list of barriers, kelp and predators are all made for the user to navigate through The Maze crab begins far away from the estuary point

      • ModelMazeGame

        public ModelMazeGame(int difficulty,
                     MazeCrab mazeCrab,
                     java.util.List<KelpPlant> kelpPlants,
                     java.util.List<Barrier> walls,
                     java.util.List<Predator> predators,
                     Vector2 estuaryPoint,
                     EstuaryOrientation estuaryOrientation)
        Creates a custom game
        Parameters:
        difficulty - determines how hard the maze is
        kelpPlants - list of all KelpPlants in the game
        walls - list of all barriers in the maze
        predators - list of all predators in the maze
        estuaryPoint - location of the point the user must reach to win the game
